BugReport.summary:
The login page crashes when attempting to enter a username with a special character> WS dosen't provide information if response containes more than 89characters. information gets information doesen't get requirement Win 11 always no
1. Navigate to the login page 2. Enter a username with a special character (e.g. !@#$%)> 3. Request method: POST 4. Click on the 'Login' button> 5. Observe the page crashing>
minor low
